sentences.en: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.cn: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

sentences.en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
sentences.cn: 留下了20名骨干人员。

sentences.en: a staff meeting
sentences.cn: 员工会议

sentences.en: A wage freeze was imposed on all staff earlier this month.
sentences.cn: 这个月早些时候，所有员工的工资都被冻结了。

sentences.en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentences.cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentences.en: Critics attacked the youth and inexperience of his staff.
sentences.cn: 批评家们抨击他的员工年纪太轻，缺乏经验。

sentences.en: Employers may become overly cautious about taking on new staff.
sentences.cn: 雇主在雇用新职员时可能会变得过于谨慎。

sentences.en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentences.cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

sentences.en: He had a staff of six salespeople working for him.
sentences.cn: 他手下有6名销售人员为他工作。

sentences.en: one of our longest-serving staff members
sentences.cn: 我们中服务年资最长的员工之一

sentences.en: Secret investigations have netted ninety staff suspected of fraud and theft.
sentences.cn: 秘密调查已抓获90名涉嫌欺诈盗窃的职员。

sentences.en: Staff problems should be addressed through training and appraisals.
sentences.cn: 职员问题应该通过培训和考核评定来解决。

sentences.en: Staff will be issued with new grey-and-yellow designer uniforms.
sentences.cn: 将会向雇员发放灰黄相间的名牌新制服。

sentences.en: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the tannoy.
sentences.cn: 车站工作人员通过广播告知火车到站了。

sentences.en: The centre is staffed mainly by volunteers.
sentences.cn: 在该中心工作的主要是志愿者。

sentences.en: The entire staff has done an outstanding job this year.
sentences.cn: 今年全体员工工作都非常出色。

sentences.en: The ground staff do all they can to prepare the pitch.
sentences.cn: 运动场管理员全力整备球场。

sentences.en: The staff were very good.
sentences.cn: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.en: The staff were very helpful.
sentences.cn: 员工非常配合。

sentences.en: There are only 35 staff to serve 30,000-plus customers.
sentences.cn: 只有35名员工，却要为3万多顾客服务。

sentences.en: They employ a total of 150 staff.
sentences.cn: 他们一共雇用 150 名员工。

sentences.en: We hear endless injunctions to build a sense of community among staff.
sentences.cn: 我们听到上面没完没了地讲要在员工中培养一种集体归属感。

sentences.en: You will be remunerated and so will your staff.
sentences.cn: 你将得到酬劳，你的职员也如此。

phrases.tran_cn: 参谋长；司令；办公室主任
员工管理；教职员管理；[经]参谋管理
支持人员；支援幕僚；后勤人员

trans.tran_cn: 全体职工，行政人群，拐杖
trans.tran_en: the people who work for an organization
to be or provide the workers for an organization
to be or provide the workers for an organization
